alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; East Valley; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 6:10PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 645 PM MST... At 610 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Usery Mountain Park, or near East Mesa, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mesa, Gilbert, Apache Junction, East Mesa, Granite Reef Dam, Falcon Field Airport, Usery Mountain Park, and Superstition Springs Mall. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 185 and 200. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 185 and 186. AZ Route 202 between mile markers 20 and 33. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; East Valley; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek
